title: bootscreennx
desc: A website to create boot images or the Nintendo Switch
descFull: bootscreenx creates boot images for the Nintendo Switch that resemble BIOS screens from early computers. It was originally an update of a similar tool for the Nintendo 3DS, but was rewritten and improved.

desc: A port of the Chromium "Dino Game" for the Nintendo Switch

title: Etta
desc: A messenger app written in React, using Google Firebase as a backend.
descFull: Etta is a messenger app that uses Google Firebase for all backend functionality. It was created using the Test Driven Development methodology.

title: Kia
desc: Simple terminal spinners for the Deno runtime
descFull: Kia is a library that allows you to use loading spinners in terminal applications that are written using the Deno runtime. Based on the Ora library for Node.js.
